tweet:
America should buy what Wisconsin makes. 

My #MadeInAmerica Act strengthens Buy America requirements for the federal government so we support Wisconsin manufacturers and their workers.

Thanks to a great Wisconsin manufacturer, Wrought Washer in Bay View for having me today! pic.twitter.com/Zj9IUZRGjc

Your Admin so far:
❌ Banned patriotic, trans Americans from serving in military 
❌ Gutted protections for transgender ppl in health care, housing & schools
❌ Said you would veto #EqualityAct
…I could keep going. 

Want to honor #PrideMonth? You’ll have to do better than this. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1134538166919204865 …

Far too often, our small and underserved communities lack the resources to solve our most pressing water challenges. 

I Introduced legislation to make sure every community across Wisconsin has access to clean drinking water, and safe & reliable water infrastructure. pic.twitter.com/xzC4cqpPSL

I’m saddened to hear of the passing of my friend and colleague, Senator Thad Cochran. It was an honor to serve with him in the Senate. 

I want to extend my deepest condolences to his family during this difficult time.

Sen Murphy is right: Trump’s junk plans aren’t worth the paper they're written on.

I met with #WI workers today who want Washington to act and rebuild our infrastructure with US products and workers. #BuyAmerica pic.twitter.com/IG1Wxh5tKX

American taxpayer money is being spent to buy foreign products and support workers in other countries.

My bill will change that and strengthen #BuyAmerica requirements for the federal government so we are supporting #MadeInWI manufacturers like C.A. Lawton and their workers.

Founded in WI, C.A. Lawton has produced large iron castings and machine components for five generations.

They shouldn’t have to compete with foreign businesses and workers. America needs to buy what #MadeInWI companies like C.A. Lawton make and support our workers here at home. pic.twitter.com/H0jb9V3gki

I was in De Pere at C.A. Lawton Company (@CALawton1879) today highlighting my Made in America Act that will strengthen #BuyAmerica requirements and put more Wisconsinites to work. pic.twitter.com/roxD60iudT
